pages.text: $(li)Snowy Temples are a variant of the $(l:patchouli:structures/desert_temple)Desert Temples$(/l) that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Taigas$(/l).$(br)$(li)Multiple treasures are hidden in their interior.$(br)$(li)Be careful, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/stray)Strays$(/l) will try to take you down.
